channel.title: Economics on DataHaven extras
channel.description: Recent content in Economics on DataHaven extras

item.title: Housing segregation in Greater New Haven
item.description: A visual deep-dive into the history of racial segregation in Greater New Haven’s housing and the patterns that remain today.

item.title: Financial (in)security in Connecticut
item.description: Visual exploration of the uneven landscape of financial security across Connecticut.

item.title: The many wage gaps in Connecticut
item.description: Visual exploration of the wage gap(s) in Connecticut by gender, race, education, occupation, and their overlaps.
